Title: Image Sourcing and Selection
Content: When sourcing images for content creation, it is essential to select images with clean backgrounds and high quality. Platforms like Pinduoduo, Taobao, and Douyin can be used to find suitable images. It is advisable to avoid images with overly commercial white backgrounds. Instead, look for user-generated content in the comments section or from expert reviews. Once you have selected an image, save it for further editing.

Title: Image Editing and Enhancement
Content: To enhance the clarity of your images, use editing tools like Xingtong, Meitu Xiuxiu, or Mink. Adjust the image ratio to 3:4, which is optimal for platforms like Xiaohongshu. Use features like sharpening and structure adjustments to improve image clarity. Additionally, tools like Mink can enhance both images and videos to high-definition quality. Apply filters and stickers to add a creative touch, ensuring they align with the overall theme of your content.

Title: Publishing on Xiaohongshu
Content: When publishing on Xiaohongshu, avoid using the direct 'Add' button. Instead, use the backend publishing option. Utilize the platform's built-in templates for a polished look. Ensure your images are clear and the aspect ratio is 3:4. Add relevant stickers and filters to enhance originality and avoid content restrictions. If unsure about design, use pre-made templates available on the platform. This method ensures your content is visually appealing and adheres to platform standards.
